actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow distributions to be made from certain pension plans before the participant is separated from employment.

summary.text: Phased Retirement Liberalization Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain pension distributions prior to employment severance if made before the earliest of a participant's: (1) normal retirement age; (2) attainment of age 59 and one-half; or (3) completion of 30 years' service.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow distributions to be made from certain pension plans before the participant is separated from employment.
